text: The Megingjörð is a belt in Norse mythology which Thor wears. According to the Prose Edda, the belt is one of Thor's three main possessions, along with the hammer Mjölnir and the iron gloves Járngreipr. When worn, the belt is described as doubling Thor's already prodigious strength. {{Orchard, Andy (1997). Dictionary of Norse Myth and Legend. Cassell. }} ==References== Category:Norse mythology
title: Megingjörð
